headline: UBS Asserts Buy Rating on The TJX Companies, Inc. (TJX) Buoyed by Market Share Gains Prospects
summary: TJX Companies Inc. (NYSE:TJX) is one of the best forever stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On December 16, UBS reiterated a Buy rating on TJX Companies Inc. (NYSE:TJX), impressed by the company’s market share gains against other department stores. The off-price retailer has been a major share gainer against department stores on sales […]
